title: Emerald Cascade Chandbali - Pachala Jhumka
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Features intricate filigree work with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite pair features a classic chandbali silhouette adorned with vibrant emeralds. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional artistry, giving it a delicate yet substantial feel. The pear-shaped emeralds at the base enhance the cascading effect. The design is inspired by traditional Mughal architecture, blended with South Indian aesthetics.
colors: with accents of white from the cubic zirconia and a hint of red from tiny accent stones.
occasions: or a special occasion such as a half-saree function. Can also elevate a contemporary outfit for a formal event.
description: This heirloom-worthy piece combines traditional design with modern refinement. The high-quality emeralds are a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A timeless design that will be cherished for generations, making it a meaningful gift and investment.
